about_the_game:
It's 1944, D-Day a section of British paratroopers assault a gun emplacement German occupied France. But when a soldier mysteriously disappears, you enter an old manor house in search of the missing comrade, the horrors of its past begin to haunt the new occupants within its walls.



You play as Alfred Stuart a sergeant in the British Parachute regiment. Emiline: The Ghost of White Willow is a gripping VR survival horror game set in 1944, where players step into the boots of a British paratrooper who miraculously survives a harrowing landing in Normandy.



Whilst missing your unit, you must establish radio communication with the next section, you must navigate a sinister haunted house, desperately searching for a missing comrade. Unbeknownst to you, the vengeful spirit of Marrion, fuelled by a tragic love triangle with her husband and the maid Emiline, seeks to capture and exact revenge on the player, who she believes stole her prized gold, leading to a spine-chilling battle for survival and uncovering the house's dark secrets.



A gothic horror where love, betrayal and murder haunt every corner, the only way to survive is to embrace the darkness, face your fears, and grab your torch to reveal the truth.

content_descriptors.notes:
Short WWII themed gunfight sequence.
Paranormal Activity.
Psychological horror elements

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X Eight-Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 3070 or better
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR

short_description: A gothic horror with intense spine chilling atmosphere find yourself trapped in the unrelenting haunts of White Willow Manor Hall. Find a way out or perish at the hands of a sinister family of Victorian apparitions.
